short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to open links in incognito mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brainly Scraper is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you quickly and easily extract information from Brainly. Whether you're a student looking to gather answers for study purposes or a researcher compiling data, this tool simplifies the process by automating the data extraction from Brainly.
